content.text:
Let me analyze the structure and provide the assembly instructions:

Structure Analysis:
- The construction consists of two connected structures
- Uses orange cylindrical pillars, yellow rectangular blocks, red blocks with arches/holes, and orange triangular roof pieces
- Multiple layers are present, with blocks stacked vertically and horizontally

Left Structure:
- Two vertical orange pillars
- Yellow rectangular block connecting them
- Red arch piece on top of the yellow block
- Orange triangular roof piece

Right Structure:
- Two vertical orange pillars
- Two yellow rectangular blocks connecting them horizontally
- Red block with circular hole at the bottom
- Orange triangular roof piece

Assembly Instructions:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 5 (vertical orange cylinder)
    Step2: Move block with index 5 (vertical orange cylinder)
    Step3: Move block with index 3 (yellow horizontal block)
    Step4: Move block with index 1 (red arch block)
    Step5: Move block with index 14 (orange triangular roof)
    Step6: Move block with index 5 (vertical orange cylinder)
    Step7: Move block with index 5 (vertical orange cylinder)
    Step8: Move block with index 4 (yellow horizontal block)
    Step9: Move block with index 4 (yellow horizontal block)
    Step10: Move block with index 2 (red circular hole block)
    Step11: Move block with index 14 (orange triangular roof)
}

This assembly sequence builds from bottom to top, ensuring stability throughout the construction process.
